q: - Around 300,000 tonnes of Ivorian cocoa, registered before presidential claimant Alassane Ouattara called for a one-month ban on deliveries, remains to be exported, the head of the local sector body CGFCC said on Monday. What I can tell you is that as of today, we have one million tonnes registered and 700,000 tonnes exported, CGFCC president Ano Gilbert told Reuters.`` Three hundred thousand tonnes are in the pipeline.'' shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
